title: Egluryn phraethineb. sebh, dosparth ar retoreg, vn oʻr saith gelbhydhyd, yn dysculhuniaith ymadrodh, aʻi pherthynassau
author: [Perry, Henry].
publisher: Printiedig gann Ioan Danter yn Lhundain,
notes: "A Welsh treatise on rhetoric, the outlines of which had previously been written by William Salesbury"--DNB.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Wales.
